channel.title: Comments on: Baba Baruch in Bergen County
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: jake
item.dc:creator: jake
item.description: It's probably for people who either can't afford to see Rabbi Pinto (a more famous descendant of Baba Sali), or aren't really sure the magic works so prefer to go the cheaper route first.
item.content:encoded: It’s probably for people who either can’t afford to see Rabbi Pinto (a more famous descendant of Baba Sali), or aren’t really sure the magic works so prefer to go the cheaper route first.
